customAccent.title: Default Accent Color
customAccent.description: Keeps theme's default accent color. Uncheck to allow chosen accent color to take affect. Toggling will cause Atom to reload.

accentColor.title: Accent Color
accentColor.description: Customize theme's accent color. Toggling will cause Atom to reload.

matchSyntaxTheme.title: Match Syntax Theme
matchSyntaxTheme.description: override syntax theme's background color to match current theme

extColor.title: file-type color
extColor.description: change file-type icon color to default colors

fontSize.title: Change Font-size
fontSize.description: adjust font-size for all UI components. For editor panel adjustments go to editor settings

settingsPanel.title: Settings Panel color
settingsPanel.description: changes background color of the settings panel to dark blue.

animationEnabled.title: enable animations
animationEnabled.description: toggle theme animations, if you find them distracting or need the extra CPU
